entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Rain at times heavy mixed with drizzle beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
